dialogue.speaker: Charlie

dialogue.speaker: Bob

dialogue.speaker: Charlie
dialogue.message: I understand your concerns, Alice. However, I still maintain my innocence. Let's continue investigating together and avoid jumping to conclusions based on assumptions. We should focus on gathering more solid evidence before making any votes.
